StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllOrgsRSS]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @FirstChar varchar(1), @LastChar varchar(1) )
AS
DECLARE @LowerFirstChar varchar(1) = LOWER(@FirstChar) DECLARE @UpperFirstChar varchar(1) = UPPER(@FirstChar) DECLARE @LowerLastChar varchar(1) = LOWER(@LastChar) DECLARE @UpperLastChar varchar(1) = UPPER(@LastChar)
DECLARE @NameFilter varchar(20) = RTRIM('[' + @LowerFirstChar + '-' + @LowerLastChar + @UpperFirstChar + '-' + @UpperLastChar + ']%')
SELECT RO.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS ORGANIZATION_ID ,RO.[STATE_CODE] AS STATE_CODE ,RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] AS ORGANIZATION_TYPE ,RO.[MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID] AS MEPS_ORGANIZATION_ID ,RO.[NAME] AS NAME ,RO.[SHORT_NAME] AS SHORT_NAME ,RO.[MCC_CODE] AS MCC_CODE ,RO.[TO_PROD_RECRUITERS] AS TO_PROD_RECRUITERS ,RO.[STREET] AS STREET ,RO.[STREET2] AS STREET2 ,RO.[CITY] AS CITY ,RO.[ZIP_CODE] AS ZIP_CODE ,RO.[ISOPEN] AS ISOPEN ,RO.[DELETED] AS DELETED ,RO.[IS_ASSIGNED] AS IS_ASSIGNED ,RO.[USER_LOGIN] AS USER_LOGIN ,RO.[UPDATE_DATE] AS UPDATE_DATE ,RO.[EFFECTIVE_DATE] AS EFFECTIVE_DATE ,RO.[rowguid] AS rowguid ,RO.[poc_email] AS poc_email ,RO.[OrgUnitId] AS OrgUnitId ,RO.[DateClosed] AS DateClosed ,RO.[CITY_CODE] AS CITY_CODE ,RO.[COUNTY_CODE] AS COUNTY_CODE ,RO.[STATE_GEO_CODE] AS STATE_GEO_CODE ,OM.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] AS PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID ,Parent.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] AS PARENT_ORGANIZATION_TYPE ,Parent.[NAME] AS PARENT_ORGANIZATION_NAME FROM [MCRISS].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] RO LEFT OUTER JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[ORGANIZATION_MAP] OM ON RO.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION] Parent ON Parent.ORGANIZATION_ID = OM.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] WHERE RO.[ORGANIZATION_TYPE] = 'RSS' AND (RO.[DateClosed] IS NULL OR RO.[DateClosed] >= '2015-10-01') AND Parent.[NAME] LIKE @NameFilter ORDER BY Parent.[NAME], RO.[NAME]
